column2: "Afei Judahen Jehosafat n’afe a otsia duawɔtwe no mu na Ahab ne ba Joram hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Israel do wɔ Samaria
column3: na odzii hen mfe duebien."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do; naaso ɔnntse dɛ n’egya
column3: na ɔnntse dɛ ne na: osiandɛ oyii Baal n’edum no a n’egya yɛe no wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Mbom ɔdze noho bataa Nebat ne ba Jeroboam no bɔn a ɔdze maa Israel yɛɛ bɔn no ho; na oemmfi ho emmfi."
"Afei Moabhen Mesha yɛ nguannyɛmfo; nna ɔma Israelhen no nguambaa mpem ɔha ho nhwi
column3: na nguannyin mpem ɔha ho nhwi."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Ahab wui no
column4: na Moabhen no tseew etua wɔ Israelhen no do."

column2: "Na no mu no ɔhen Jehoram fiir edzi fii Samaria
column3: na ɔkɛkaan Israel nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔkɔree kɔsomae ma wɔkɔr Judahen Jehosafat nkyɛn
column3: dɛ
column4: Moabhen no atsew mo do etua: ana enye me bɔkɔ enye Moab akɔko a? Na ɔsee dɛ
column6: me man tse dɛ wo man
column7: mo mpɔnkɔ tse dɛ wo mpɔnkɔ."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Ɔkwan bɛn do na yɛbɛfa akɔ? Na obuaa dɛ
column4: Edom sar no do kwan no do a."

column2: "Nna Israelhen
column3: na Judahen
column4: na Edomhen no sii mu kɔree: na wokyiin nda esuon kwan: nna nsu bi nnyi hɔ mma dɔm no
column5: na eso mbowa a wodzi hɔn ekyir no."

column2: "Na Israelhen no see dɛ
column3: Annyɛ yie! EWURADZE afrɛ ahemfo baasa yi ehyia dɛ oriyi hɛn akɛhyɛ Moab nsa."

column2: "Na Jehosafat see dɛ
column3: Ana EWURADZE nkɔnhyɛnyi bi nnyi ha a yebodua no do ebisa EWURADZE hɔ adze? Na Israelhen no no nkowaa no mu baako buae see dɛ
column4: Safat ne ba Elisha a ohuee nsu guu Elija ne nsa do no

column2: "Na Jehosafat see dɛ
column3: EWURADZE n’asɛm wɔ ne nkyɛn. Nna Israelhen na Jehosafat na Edomhen no sianee kɔr ne nkyɛn."

column2: "Na Elisha see Israelhen no dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na menye wo wɔ yɛ? Kɔ w’egya no nkɔnhyɛfo no
column4: na wo na no nkɔnhyɛfo no nkyɛn. Na Israelhen no see no dɛ
column5: Dabida: osiandɛ EWURADZE afrɛ ahemfo baasa yi ehyia dɛ oriyi hɛn akɛhyɛ Moab nsa."

column2: "Na Elisha see dɛ
column3: Dɛ dɔm EWURADZE a migyina n’enyim yi tse ase yi
column5: sɛ nnyɛ Judahen Jehosafat n’enyim na mohwɛ a
column6: nkyɛ merennkyea m’enyi wɔ wo do

column2: "Na afei hom mfa ɔsankubɔfo mbrɛ me. Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a ɔsankubɔfo no robɔ no
column4: nna EWURADZE ne nsa baa no do."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column4: Hom nyɛ ɔbɔn yi amona amona."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: Hom runnhu mframa
column5: naaso nsu bɛhyɛ ɔbɔn no ma: na hom anom
column6: hom na hom fiembowa na hom adzesoa mbowa."

column2: "Na iyi so yɛ EWURADZE enyi do adze tootooba: obeyi Moabfo no so ahyɛ hom nsa."
"Na hom mbɔ kurow biara a wɔagye ho ban
column3: na kurow biara a ɔyɛ fɛw
column6: na hom mfa abo nsɛɛ asaase no tɔw pa biara."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ anapa
column3: bɛyɛ afɔrbɔber no
column6: nsu fii Edom kwan do bae
column7: na nsu hyɛɛ ɔman no ma."

column2: "Afei aber a Moabfo nyinara tsee dɛ ahemfo no wɔafow aba dɛ wɔnye hɔn robɔko no
column3: wɔpoon hɔnho boaa ano
column4: hɔn a wobotum emia akodze nyinara

column2: "Na wɔsoɛɛr anapaatu
column3: na ewia gyegyee nsu no do
column4: na Moabfo no hun nsu no wɔ hɔn enyim tsentsendo dɛ ɔber dɛ bɔgya:"

column2: "na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Iyi bɔgya a; ampa ahemfo no nye hɔn edzi dɔmpata
column4: na woekuku hɔnho: dɛm ntsi afei
column6: hom nkɔ asadze no ho ɛ."

column2: "Na aber a wodur Israel nseraban ho no
column3: Israelfo no soɛree kunkum Moabfo no
column4: ma woguanee wɔ hɔn enyim: na wɔhoom do kɔr kan wɔ asaase no mu dɛ worukuku Moabfo no."

column2: "Na wodwuruuw nkurow no; na nyimpa biara toow no bo kyeen asaasetɔw pa biara do hyɛɛ no ma; na wosisiiw nsunyiwa biara
column3: na wotwitwaa ndua pa no nyinara: kyerɛ Kir-hareset nko na wogyaa n’abo; naaso tsiabotofo no kotwaa ho hyiae

column2: "Na aber a Moabhen hun dɛ ɔko no mu ayɛ dzen dodow ama no no
column3: ɔfaa mbarimba ahaesuon a wɔtwe mfona kaa noho
column4: dɛ ɔretsew mu akɔ Edomhen no nkyɛn: na woenntum."

column2: "Nna ɔfaa ne ba panyin a nkyɛ obedzi hen wɔ n’ananmu no
column3: na ɔdze no bɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr wɔ fasu no do. Na hu kɛsenara tɔɔ Israel do: na wofii ne nkyɛn kɔree
column4: na wɔsanee baa hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do."
